title: ahaha naiva jAnE
sahitya:
ahaha naiva jAnE


caraNam 1    kAncana navaratna lasita gOpuramiha kim madiyamahO dayArAmA rAma rAma
    caraNam 2    pracura gandha divya dhUpa surabhi kusuma parimiLitam lasati bhUri dhAma dhAma dhAma
    caraNam 3    shrI sarasijanAbha caraNayugaLa vinata lOka nikara kalita sarva kAma kAma kAma
